mapper.insert: insert into campus_cart(c_cartnumber, u_userid, p_number, c_count) values(campus_cart_seq.nextval, #{u_userid} , #{p_number} ,#{c_count})
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where u_userid=#{u_userid} and p_number=#{p_number}

select p.p_number, m.u_userid, c.c_cartnumber, m.u_username, m.u_username, p.p_name,c.c_count, p.p_price, (p_price * c_count) money from campus_cart c, campus_member m , campus_product p where m.userid = c.userid and p.p_number = c.p_number and c.userid=#{u_userid} order by c.c_cartnumber
